short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: XTask - The first Tap-to-Earn & Quest-to-Earn project on X to onboard users into Web3

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you spending hours on Twitter every week? Start making it count.

xTask is an innovative Chrome extension seamlessly integrates with your X.com account, transforming everyday actions like liking, retweeting, and creating engaging content into opportunities to earn.

Forget complicated setups! XTask welcomes everyone, from seasoned influencers to X.com newcomers. Start reaping the benefits from your very first interaction.

Features:

- Tap Tap: Tap Tap is an addictive clicker game where you accumulate points by tapping the screen. Points are in-game rewards exchangeable for something really cool later. 
- Quests: Dive into a world of engaging quests, from simple tasks like liking and retweeting to creative challenges that inspire the community. Every quest you conquer brings you closer to exclusive rewards, fueling your journey in the exciting world of Web3.

How to start:

Effortless Setup: Install the xQuest Chrome extension.
Seamless Integration: Sign in using your existing X.com account for instant access.
Tap & Quest Your Way to Rewards: Play the addictive Tap Tap game or dive into a variety of quests, from simple engagements to community challenges.
Earn What You Deserve: Every action you take translates into rewards

XTask: The future of social media earning!
